enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_blade.d: The lower the durability of the weapon the higher the damage increase, up to 1.15x.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_god.des: Very low probability of dealing command level damage, probability affected by luck.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_meow.de: The attack itself makes a catcall. Nothing more.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_king.de: You can use minerals to strengthen your weapon, adding 1 point of damage for every 20 points of strengthening.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_emperor: The number of kills will be recorded, and for every 50 kills, 1 point of damage will be added.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_day.des: Increases damage during the day and decreases it at night.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_night.d: Increases damage at night and decreases it during the day.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_ninja.d: Goes into stealth when taking damage and increases damage.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_soul.de: Gain souls per attack, and spend 200 souls to heal 10% of your life when wounded.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_blessin: Gain one tier of blessing per cat bred, reducing by two tiers when the cat dies. Consume one tier of blessing to reduce damage when injured, stackable.
Has a chance to bounce back damage when injured and is immune to this damage.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_life.de: Has a probability to mitigate damage greater than 20% of life and less than 150% to 20%.
enchantment.nekoenchantment.neko_chop.de: There is a probability of obtaining a biological head
